dict.acceptation: 朝一个方向的；到某种状态；关闭；

sent.trans: 英语中“to have”变化不规则。

sent.orig: In Polish the verb 'to be' takes the instrumental case.
sent.trans: 在波兰语中，动词to be 用工具格。

sent.orig: It's better to go back and make a net than to stand by the pond and long for fish.; Better return home and make a net than long for fish by the waterside.; It's better to go back and make a net than to covet the fish by merely staring into the water -- one should have a down-to-earth style of work to attain one's goal.; One should take practical steps to achieve one's aims.
sent.trans: 临渊羡鱼，莫如退而结网。

sent.orig: I regret having to tell you to leave[I regret to have to tell you to leave].
sent.trans: 很抱歉，我现在得叫你走。

sent.orig: Bonny Hicks appeared to me to be the paradigmatic example of an autonomous, free-choosing individual who decided early on to construct a lifestyle congenial to her idiosyncratic sense of self-expression.
sent.trans: 对我而言，彭妮充分体现了一个自由自主的人，如何在年轻的时候根据个人的自我表现来决定她所要的生活方式。
